subject: Password reset request for your account on %s Supernode
plainText: We received a password reset request for your email address on %s Supernode, but there is no account with such email address on this server. If you did not request the password reset, then please ignore this email. If you did, then perhaps you used a different email address for your account on this server, or perhaps you have an account on a different supernode.
title: %s Supernode
body2: We received a password reset request for your email address on %s Supernode, but there is no account with such email address on this server.
body3: If you did not request the password reset, then please ignore this email.
body4: If you did, then perhaps you used a different email address for your account on this server, or perhaps you have an account on a different supernode.
